name: CATLINK
0:
”Alexa, ask CATLINK scooper to clean once”
”Alexa, ask CATLINK feeder to release food”
”Alexa, ask CATLINK fountain to flow”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cat link
Developer Terms of Use
des:
'CATLINK' is a skill used to control CATLINK products remotely for the users in Europe, North America or South America.
*If you're in Oceania, Africa, Antarctica or Asia(Not available in Mainland China), please search and use the skill named 'CATLINK-ALL'.

Currently three types of CATLINK products are supported to be controlled remotely via the skill.
They are CATLINK cat litter box (Scooper), cat feeder, cat waterfountain.

The detailed skill commands are as following.

1. Make CATLINK cat litter box to clean.
You need to say 'Alexa, ask CATLINK scooper to clean once'.
Alexa would response 'Your command has been executed' if everything works fine.

2. Make CATLINK feeder to release food.
You need to say 'Alexa, ask CATLINK feeder to release food'.
Alexa would response 'Your command has been executed' if everything works fine.

3. Make CATLINK water fountain to flow.
You need to say 'Alexa, ask CATLINK fountain to flow'.
Alexa would response 'Your command has been executed' if everything works fine.

Before trying with the skill, please don't forget to check the following things:
1) you have downloaded CATLINK APP
2) you have registered an account on CATLINK APP
3) you have added CATLINK products via CATLINK APP and the products have connected to the internet
4) you have done CATLINK account authorization on Alexa APP

Hoping that you're enjoying the skill, if any futher question please contact CATLINK customer service.
